DIALOG.DeleteItem.Content: Are you sure you want to delete: '{name}'?
DIALOG.DeleteItem.Restricted: '{name}' cannot be deleted because it is restricted by '{parentName}'.

PTU.Title: Pokémon Tabletop Reunited
PTU.HardenedEffect0: Injuries beyond the 5th do not lower Maximum Hit Points
PTU.HardenedEffect1: +1 to Critical Hit and Effect Range
PTU.HardenedEffect4: Immune to Loss of Hit Points (but not damage) from all effects
PTU.HardenedEffect5: Resist all damage one step further
PTU.InjuryEffect1: Unable to regain Hit Points from Resting
PTU.InjuryEffect2: Take {injuries} Damage whenever taking a Standard Action during Combat
PTU.SkillBackgroundNotice:
Please note that this is purely for you to keep track!
the sheet doesn't automatically apply trainer skill backgrounds.
PTU.WeatherHint:
Set and edit ongoing weather or other global effects!

Create new global effects by dragging any Effect Item onto this window.
You can set the weather to apply to 'Players', 'Opposition' or 'All' actors.

Weather & Global Effects Menu

PTU.DexScan.Off: DM has turned off the Pokédex Scan feature.

PTU.PartySheet.NoTrainer: This Pokémon does not belong to any party, please assign one from a trainer's sheet.

LevelUpForm.EvolutionHint: It appears {name} is ready to evolve. Would you like to evolve it now?

MassGenerator.Title: Mass Generator
MassGenerator.Folder: Folder to put generated Pokémon in
MassGenerator.CouldNotFindFolder: Folder {folder} not found, it will be created upon submit

Action.AttackOutOfRange: The target is out of range
Action.MoveWhileFrozen: You can't use moves while frozen
Action.MoveWhileSleeping: You can't use moves while sleeping
Action.StatusAttackWhileRaging: You cannot use a Status Move while Raging
Action.SuppressedMove: While suppressed you can only use at-will moves
Action.ConfusionFail: {name} hurt itself in its confusion! and takes {damage} damage.

Paralyzed.Success: {name} is paralyzed but managed to move anyway!

Hypermode.Fail: {name} is raging and can only use Shadow Moves!
Hypermode.Create: {name}'s rage is getting out of hand, they entered Hyper Mode!

Action.CaptureNoTarget: You need to target a Pokémon to capture
Action.CaptureWrongTarget: You need to target a Pokémon to capture
Action.NoTarget: You need to target an actor before using a move

PTU.CriticalImmunityLabel: Crit turned to hit due to crit immunity
PTU.Recalc: Click to add current targets to this roll, shift click to overwrite current targets

Notifications.CannotApplyOnMiss: You can't apply damage on a target that isn't hit.
Notifications.InvalidRoll: Something went wrong while applying damage
Notifications.NoEffect: It appears this move doesn't have any special effect.

ApplyDamage.BossBarBroken: <actor>{actor}</actor>'s Boss HP Bar is broken! ({bars} left)
ApplyDamage.MassiveDamageInjury: <actor>{actor}</actor> gained 1 injury from taking Massive Damage.
ApplyDamage.BossHalfBarInjury: <actor>{actor}</actor> gained 1 injury from having lost half of its Boss HP Bars!.

Migrations.Finished: PTR System Migration to version {version} completed!
Migrations.OnlyGMCanUse: Only a gamemaster can use this tool.
Migrations.OutsideSchemaRange: The specified range is outside the system's schema version range (between {minimum} and {maximum}).
Migrations.Starting: Applying PTR System Migration to version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.

Summary.HelpResources: An unexpected error was encountered while migrating some actors or items. If you would like further assistance, feel free to report an issue at the system repository or visit us on Discord for community support.
Summary.Title: Migration Summary

Troubleshoot.Hint: Here you can run a remigration, which will attempt to automatically fix issues with actors and items.
Troubleshoot.Title: System Troubleshooting
Troubleshoot.Name: Document Name

Migrations.WorldNotReady: Game world not ready: try again in a few seconds.

Theme.Label: Theme
Theme.Hint: if empty will default to your pokeball (if a pokemon) or 'default', if theme cannot be found the parchment theme will be used.

PTU.UserNeedsToOwnCharacter: You need to set a character for your user in order to use this feature.

General.Label: Label
General.EvenHelpText: Triggers when roll result is even.

AddType.Label: Add Type
AddType.Hint: Please provide the name & icon for the new type.

IconImg.Name: Type Icon
IconImg.Hint: The icon to use for the type.

BarImg.Name: Type Bar Image
BarImg.Hint: The bar image to use for the type when displaying in Chat.

Variant.Name: Variant Rules
Variant.Label: Toggle Variant Rules
Variant.Hint: Enable and configure variant rules like 'Use Dex EXP' for the system.

UseTutorPoints.Name: Use Tutor Points for Pokémon
UseTutorPoints.Hint: Otherwise use the suggested changes in the 'GM Advice and Suggested Houserules' (see: https://pastebin.com/iDt2Mj0d)

UseDexExp.Name: Use Dex Exp for Trainers
UseDexExp.Hint: Whether the system should check how many pokemon are marked as 'Caught' in a Trainer's dex, and add that to their dex experience total.

TrainerRevamp.Name: Use Trainer Revamp (max lvl 25)
TrainerRevamp.Hint: Use DataNinja's alt. Trainer Revamp ruleset, disables Dex Exp. (see: https://shorturl.at/oCDWY)

trainerAdvancement.Name: Trainer Advancement Track
trainerAdvancement.Hint: The Trainer Advancement Track to use for Trainer Leveling.

SpiritPlaytest.Name: Enable Friendship & Spirit [Playtest]
SpiritPlaytest.Hint: Enable the Friendship & Spirit Playtest ruleset. For more info see https://ptufvtt.com/Rules/Playtests/Spirit-Friendship

ImprovedStatsRework.Name: Enable Improved Stats Rework
ImprovedStatsRework.Hint: Enable the Improved Stats Rework ruleset. For more info see https://ptufvtt.com/en/Rules/Playing-The-Game/Stats#new-playtest

Automation.Name: Automation
Automation.Label: Toggle Automation
Automation.Hint: Enable and configure automation rules like 'Remove Expired Effects' for the system.

LevelUpScreen.Name: Show Level-Up Window
LevelUpScreen.Hint: Allow the level-up window to appear whenever a Pokémon levels up.

MaxEvasion.Name: Max Evasion
MaxEvasion.Hint: The maximum evasion a creature can have. (Default 9)

AutoExpireEffects.Name: Auto-Expire Effects
AutoExpireEffects.Hint: Automatically expire effects when their duration is up.

FailAttackIfOutOfRange.Name: Fail Attack if Out of Range
FailAttackIfOutOfRange.Hint: Automatically fail an attack if the target is out of range.

FailAttackIfNoTarget.Name: Fail Attack if No Target
FailAttackIfNoTarget.Hint: Automatically fail an attack if no actor is targeted.

AutoFaint.Name: Auto-Faint
AutoFaint.Hint: Automatically adds the fainted condition to a Pokémon when it reaches 0 HP.

AutoFaintRecovery.Name: Auto-Faint Recovery
AutoFaintRecovery.Hint: Automatically remove the fainted condition from a Pokémon when it is healed above 0 HP.

MassiveDamageThreshold.Name: Massive Damage (%)
MassiveDamageThreshold.Hint: The % of max HP resulting in an Injury from Massive Damage. (A huge percentage like 10000 practically disables Injuries from this source)

HpInjuryGateInterval.Name: Injury HP Interval (%)
HpInjuryGateInterval.Hint: Down from 100% max HP, reaching every interval of this percentage causes an injury. E.g. 50% => 50%, 0%, -50%, ... (A huge percentage like 10000 practically disables Injuries from this source)

Generation.Name: Generation
Generation.Label: Toggle Generation
Generation.Hint: Enable and configure generation rules like 'Default Image Directory' for the system.

DefaultImageDirectory.Name: Default Image Directory
DefaultImageDirectory.Hint: The default directory to look for images in when generating a Pokémon.

DefaultImageExtension.Name: Default Image Extension
DefaultImageExtension.Hint: The default extension to use when looking for images for generating a Pokémon.

DefaultTokenImageExtension.Name: Default Token Image Extension
DefaultTokenImageExtension.Hint: The default extension to use when looking for token images for generating a Pokémon.

DefaultPokemonImageNameType.Name: Pokemon Image Name Type
DefaultPokemonImageNameType.Hint: Whether the images are based on name (checked) or dex number (unchecked)

DefaultDexDragInLevelMin.Name: Default Minimum Species Drag-In Level
DefaultDexDragInLevelMin.Hint: The default minimum level for a Pokémon dragged into a scene from a species item

DefaultDexDragInLevelMax.Name: Default Maximum Species Drag-In Level
DefaultDexDragInLevelMax.Hint: The default maximum level for a Pokémon dragged into a scene from a species item

DefaultDexDragInShinyChance.Name: Default Species Drag-In Shiny Chance (%)
DefaultDexDragInShinyChance.Hint: The default shiny chance for a Pokémon dragged into a scene from a species item

DefaultDexDragInStatRandomness.Name: Default Species Drag-In Stat Randomness (%)
DefaultDexDragInStatRandomness.Hint: The default stat randomness for a Pokémon dragged into a scene from a species item

DefaultDexDragInPreventEvolution.Name: Default Species Drag-In Prevent Evolution
DefaultDexDragInPreventEvolution.Hint: Whether a Pokémon's evolution should be prevented during Species Drag-In Generation.

Metagame.Name: Metagame
Metagame.Label: Limit Metagame information
Metagame.Hint: Limit what kinds of metagame information is available to players.

DexPermissions.Name: Pokédex Permissions
DexPermissions.Hint: The required permission for a player to be able to see a Pokédex entry

AlwaysShowCrits.Name: Always Show Crits
AlwaysShowCrits.Hint: Always show crits in the chat even if no crit was rolled.

AllowPlayersToEditSpecies.Name: Allow Players to Edit Species
AllowPlayersToEditSpecies.Hint: Allow players to edit the species of their Pokémon.

NuclearType.Name: Enable Nuclear Type
NuclearType.Hint: Adds Pokémon Uranium's Nuclear Type to the game based on DataNinja's Homebrew Compilation's Uranium Data.

ShadowType.Name: Enable Shadow Type
ShadowType.Hint: Adds Pokémon Colosseum's Shadow Type to the game based on PTR Ruleset's Shadow Type.

Type.Name: Custom Type Editor
Type.Label: Custom Type Editor
Type.Hint: Modify type effectiveness and add new types to the system

TypeEffectiveness.Name: Type Effectiveness
TypeEffectiveness.Hint: The effectiveness of a type against another type

Delete.Title: Delete type
Delete.Label: Delete
Delete.Content: Are you sure you want to delete this type?

Reset.Title: Reset Type Effectiveness
Reset.Content: Are you sure you want to reset the type effectiveness to the default values?

TempHP.PluralNew: {actor} now has {newQuantity} temporary hit points {wasAt} from {item}.
TempHP.SingleNew: {actor} now has {newQuantity} temporary hit point {wasAt} from {item}.

CaptureSuccess.Title: Capture Success
CaptureSuccess.Hint: To which trainer's party should the Pokemon be added?

Trainer.Name: Trainer
Trainer.Hint: The trainer to add the Pokemon to

PartyChoice.Name: Party Location
PartyChoice.Hint: Where in the Party should the Pokemon be added?

CaptureSuccess.TrainerNotFound: An invalid trainer was selected, please try again.
CaptureSuccess.UserNotFound: The selected trainer is not assigned to a user, please try again.
CaptureSuccess.LocationNotFound: An invalid location was selected, please try again.
CaptureSuccess.PokemonNotFound: Unable to find the Pokemon, did you delete it?
CaptureSuccess.ChatMessage: {trainer} Caught {pokemon}! They have been added to {location}.

Enrichment.LikelyMalformedExpressionBrowserCrashed: The expression is likely malformed and caused the Compendium Browser to crash when trying to open.

CompendiumBrowser.Hint: Please select a tab to continue...
